text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hell yeah, it's just me and the sea, one on one! 
See ya later, T!

The summer camp was underway. Amidst the blue waves, 
a little speck named Hishi Amazon was swimming with 
full abandon. The result of which was that…

… No matter how long I waited, she didn't return. 
The blues of the sea were giving way to the reds 
of evening when, at last……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hooh… haah… wooh… haaah…… I'm back, T! I finally did it!
choice_data_list:
I was getting worried, y'know? 
What were you doing?

I was getting worried, y'know? 
What were you doing?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Well, I went swimming, and then a current took me away 
from shore. I ended up all the way in open waters…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
It would've been easy enough to slip out of and get back, 
but it was like the ocean was challenging me, you know?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
So I took it head on! Swimming against the flow, I made it 
back on pure strength! Hmph, those rip currents aren't 
all that either, are they?

…… Remember kids, don't be like this maniac. It was the first 
thing to pop into my head, and I hoped somehow, somewhere, 
someone who needed to would hear it.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Well then, I had a great workout today so let's head on back, T.
Just as we were about to leave the beach ——

text_block_list.name: A Local
text_block_list.text:
Mmmh, this is a real pickle… I'm running out of time, too. 
What am I gonna do…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hm? That's someone over there, isn't it? Looks like a local. 
Heey, are you being troubled by something?

text_block_list.name: A Local
text_block_list.text:
Ah… To tell the truth, we're holding a karaoke contest 
at the summer festival tonight……

text_block_list.name: A Local
text_block_list.text:
But we're having a bit of trouble because there are 
so few participants. Maybe having it outdoors does 
make folks feel a bit too self-conscious.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, that sure's a bummer, yeah. I can't just overlook 
someone in trouble. Though, I'd love to lend a hand in 
gathering people, but…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
If they're all that shy, then inviting them won't help. 
You have any good ideas, Big T?
choice_data_list: We could ask the others here on camp?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Ohh! We don't need to invite anyone if all of us 
just join in! I got you!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That's my T, putting that brain to work! A horsegirl 
karaoke competition! Oh, I'm fired up now!

text_block_list.name: Entry No.6
text_block_list.text: Thanks for cheering for me!

All the horsegirls singing and dancing, full of summer passion, 
made the karaoke competition an exciting event to be part of.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You girls aren't bad at all, huh. But the best is yet to come! 
Thanks for firing up the crowd for me! Victory will be mine!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
'Course I am! We worked on it together, 
so you know the impact of my singing!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
The stage is outside, the sky is the limit. Do you really think 
someone could beat me in this situation? They'd need to 
bring some serious firepower…

text_block_list.name: Entry No.7
text_block_list.text:
I'm number seven, and I'll be singing a duet with little 
Kenta here, from the local junior high! Enjoy our collab!

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: (Ooooh!)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: You… wha? A duet!? I wasn't expecting this……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: And everyone's really into it!

text_block_list.name: Entry No.7
text_block_list.text: Wooh! Thanks, everyone♪ What score did we get…?

text_block_list.name: Entry No.7
text_block_list.text: Yaaaay, 98 points!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Ninety-eight poooiints!? T-T-This isn't looking good. 
Even I can't match a duet with a local kid just by 
singing on my own……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
What am I supposed to do? This isn't even just a matter of good 
or bad anymore! I need to come up with something…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Uugh, but thinking about how to do things is what 
I'm worst at… You got anything, Big T?
choice_data_list: An eye for an eye, as they say!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Huh? What are you… An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth? 
What, and a duet for a duet……?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that's exactly it! If I just sing a duet too, we'll even 
the playing field… I need to find a good partner then!
choice_data_list: Wanna try finding someone from your dorm?
Wanna try finding someone from your dorm?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Sure, that works. Pairing up with someone with live concert 
experience would be a safe bet. Only……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I think I want to try something different. Follow my intuition! 
I already have a partner for a duet. Right, Big T?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That's right. You might not be as good 
as an experienced horsegirl, but…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: It's our duet! We share a special bond far beyond explaining!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Remember when we had that cooking showdown? 
We both gave it our all with completely different dishes.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That's exactly what I want. That mutual understanding we had 
even as we were relentlessly pushing each other.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I want it to be both a duet and a duel! 
To have an exciting battle in song…!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You're the only one who can partner with me for this! 
Don't you wanna give it a go? Singing together? 
You know my songs!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hahah, I knew I could count on ya! 
With you by my side, we'll be a hundred strong!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Let's go, partner!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Alright, alright, it's time for the highlight of the evening! 
I'm sure everyone enjoyed the cute collab, but you all 
wanna see some sparks in summer, don't you!?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Me and Big T here are gonna duke it out, so listen up! 
Blast us some music!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Come on, let's toast to our victory! Hahah, you surprised me 
with your singing skills, Big T!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
We really let it all out competing for the summer spotlight! 
Maybe it's because of that passion that we won?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Pheh. Hey, hey, what's this now? You keep that talk up and I'll put ya in a headlock!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Ultimately, neither of us could ever match the other. 
And it's exactly because we both do our own thing 
that everything turns out well.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That's the path we found together, isn't it? 
Our very own, that no one else can follow…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
So don't question it, Big T. Just keep running alongside me. 
The two of us will be going head to head the whole way!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Clashing, trading blows, coming out on top somehow and having 
a laugh. Don't you wanna join me? Enjoy the ride a little?
choice_data_list: Oh, I'll join the ride! I'll have a season pass!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Big T…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Wait, you—! What do you even mean with that!? 
You're enjoying the ride a little too much, sheesh.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
But… heheh. Awesome, I'll keep ya to it! 
Our competition's still at the entrance gates!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I'm not gonna lose to you, so don't you go losing to me either! 
We're going head to head all the way! Come try surpass me!

Our footprints were never aligned, leaving only 
jumbled marks of our confrontations behind us… 
I guess that, too, is a way of being side by side.
